title: Remote Annotator – Striping & Marking (CVAT)
job_overview:
We’re looking for fast, reliable individuals to help label road striping and pavement markings in aerial and street-level images. This remote role starts with a short training period, and successful annotators may be offered longer-term work.

What You’ll Need:

-Basic computer skills and comfort with online tools
-Experience using CVAT (we’ll provide guidance if needed)
-Familiarity with Mapbox or online maps (a plus, not required)
-Ability to focus and follow clear instructions
-Good English communication
-Willingness to use a time tracker while working
-Bonus: Experience labeling images or working with spatial data

What You’ll Do:

-Label map imagery following simple guidelines
-Use CVAT and Mapbox to complete annotation tasks
-Ensure accuracy and consistency in your work
-Fix any labeling issues if needed
-Keep steady progress and meet daily goals

How to Apply:
Send a short message describing any similar work you’ve done, your experience with CVAT or image labeling, and when you’re available to start.
